inclusion.criterion: polycystic ovarian syndrome diagnosed followed by Rotterdam criteria (2003)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Women who were already diagnosed as diabetes by endocrinologists
exclusion.label: met

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old female infant with jaundice that started one day ago. She was born at 34w of gestation and kept in an incubator due to her gestational age.
